claims.claim: MEDITECH saved 7 hours per employee per week using Gemini
claims.quote: 7 hours saved per employee per week with Gemini

claims.claim: Improved job satisfaction as employees can focus on strategic work
claims.quote: Improved job satisfaction as team members can focus on more strategic projects

claims.claim: Faster access to complex industry information through AI summarization
claims.quote: Faster, simpler access to complex industry information with Gemini summarization

claims.claim: Average of 7 hours saved per employee per week by reducing manual tasks
claims.quote: We found that we were able to save an average of seven hours per employee per week by reducing some manual tasks such as notetaking during meetings or drafting and revising emails and documents

claims.claim: Teams feel more satisfied with their jobs due to automation of mundane tasks
claims.quote: Our teams overall are feeling more satisfied with their jobs because they're able to automate these more mundane tasks and focus on innovation
